transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, haan ji ma'am.
Customer: Haan, ab meri aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Haan ji.
Executive: Theek hai. So, main bol rahi thi aapke jo system mein work karte hain, usme auto refresh plus aapka download hai?
Customer: Ma'am, aawaz abhi bhi nahi aa rahi hai. Mujhe samajh nahi aa raha aap kya bol rahe hain.
Executive: Ek minute, ek minute ma'am, aawaz chali jaati hai. Thoda sa.

Executive: Abhi meri aawaz theek aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, abhi meri aawaz theek aa rahi hai?
Customer: Thodi theek hai ma'am, thodi better hai pehle se. Haan ji.
Executive: Haan, so main aapse keh rahi thi ki aap na apne system mein auto refresh plus download kariye. Main aapko batati hu kaise kaise karna hai. New tab open kariye.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Side mein right side mein corner mein aapke wo aa rahi hogi email id ka jo first letter likha hota hai. G ya T ya HXYZ jo bhi likha hua hai. Uske side mein three dots hain, right?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Uspe click kariye. Hmm. Neeche jaake extension ka option aata hai, extension.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Uspe click kariye. Hmm. Abhi aapko do option aa rahe hain. Ek visit manager extension and visit chrome web store. Haan, haan to uspe click kariye visit chrome web store. Visit chrome. Okay. Haan wahi. And then ab aapko search ka option aa raha hai. Waha pe search kariye auto refresh plus.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Auto refresh.
Hmm. Auto refresh plus. Auto refresh plus. Haan, isko click kariye. Hmm. Auto usko kariye add.
Customer: Ma'am, aawaz nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main keh rahi hu refresh uspe click karke add to chrome kariye. Click kariye uspe. Add to chrome, haan ji aa raha hai add to chrome. Haan haan to kar dijiye uspe. Hmm. Kar diya?
Customer: Add extension.
Executive: Haan, dekhiye ho gaya hai wo add?
Customer: Ho raha hai ma'am, abhi to nahi hua.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Mujhe bataiye jaise ho jaaye wo. Aur ab aapko jab bhi aap apna bylead wala section open karke aa gaya ma'am, ab isme options aa rahe hain. Auto restart time interval. Haan. Haan ji. Haan so wo kar lijiye. And ab jab aap na wo open karenge na bylead wala section to hamesha usme recent tab open karke rakhiyega. Every 12 second mein wo refresh hota rahega khud se.
Customer: Achcha, isme ek option aa raha hai default time interval 12 seconds.
Executive: Haan, to uspe click kariye. Hmm. 12 second mein na wo automatic refresh hota rahega. Wo jo na hum wo jo issue ho raha tha na ki hum keh rahe the ki aapse baar baar refresh kariye. Ab aapko karne ki zarurat nahi padegi. To ek baar isko kara ke dekh lete hain. Ab ye auto refresh hota rahega khud se. To aapko recent tab mein rehna hai hamesha, theek hai? To mujhe auto start pe kar auto start pe click karna hai ya isko as it is hi chhod du main? Nahi, jo set as default aa raha hai uspe click kar dijiye.
Customer: Kya ma'am?
Executive: Aap bol rahe hain na set as default ka option aa raha hai 12 second. Hmm. To uspe click kariye. Wo to on hai. Enable random interval wo to on hai. Haan. Haan so abhi wo restart ya wo to nahi aa raha restart ka is type se option? Nahi ma'am, isme to bas time interval ke jo aapke right side mein wo aa rahe hain. Options aa rahe hain auto start predefined countdown page monitor. Haan to wo refresh ho gaya na. Abhi haan to abhi wo automatic refresh hota rahega every 12 second mein. To abhi isko kara ke bhi main dekhti hu matlab maine matlab abhi main kam se kam kar thoda sa aur iska karne message kiya. To maine unse kya karte hain kya nahi to maine ek baar ye wala scene matlab mere kisi dusre senior colleague ne bataya ki isko aise bhi kar sakte hain maybe ye wala issue aa raha ho kyuki ye refresh hume nahi kar sakte hain. To unse boliye ki ye add kar lijiye. To wo add ho gaya hai?
Customer: Ma'am, haan ye maine auto start pe main gayi hu. Setting save successfully aa gaya auto start URL ka tha usme auto refresh plus auto start the page reload function when these URLs are open in your browser. Haan haan haan bas bas bas bas. Main aapko karke dekhiye aap haan aur browser restart. Ye bhi on kar deti hu. Haan, sab ho gaya ma'am. Theek hai auto to abhi apne aap hi auto matlab auto refresh hota rahega. Haan haan auto refresh hota rahega. Okay.

Customer: Theek hai ma'am, dekhte hain kya hota hai aage.
Executive: Haan. Haan na. Theek hai. Haan dekhiye aap aur koi issue aate hai to main aapko dekh rahi hu. Main ek magnetic lock ka bhi label machine ka bhi kal yesterday aayi hui hai. To ye agar aapko lage. Ma'am haan wo lead manager pe mere ko query aa rakhi thi. Do queries maine create kari thi. Haan ji ek interactive flat panel ki aur ek iski labeling machine ki to wo queries aa rakhi thi.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Ma'am aapki aawaz bilkul nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Main keh rahi thi jaise ki maine aapko bataya tha ki aapko five leads consume karni hai daily basis pe and lead sanrakshan aur aur
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to hear executive clearly.

- Wants auto-refresh to work on buyleads section.



Resolution:

- Executive guided to install auto-refresh extension.

- Explained how to set up auto-refresh.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will monitor if auto-refresh works.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- auto refresh, buyleads, extension, settings
